resources.string: "Email is invalid. Please check it for typos and ensure it meets the format 'name@example.com'."
Could not reach server. Check your internet connection
Text fields must not be empty
Password is invalid. It must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and a number or special character.
Login is invalid. It should only contain lowercase letters, numbers, underscores or hyphens and be between 3 and 16 characters long.
